## Includes

```{r}
source(here::here('R/shared.R'))
```

## Notes

-  this can easily be functionified if you'll need to run it repeatedly 
 




## Example

```{r}
library(xml2) 
 
tei_judges_xml <- 
  read_xml(here::here("outputs/tei-judges.xml"), options = "") 
 
ns <- xml_ns_rename(xml_ns(tei_judges_xml), d1 = "tei") 
 
tibble( 
    id=xml_text(xml_find_all(tei_judges_xml, ".//tei:listPerson/tei:person/@xml:id", ns) ),  
    name=xml_text(xml_find_all(tei_judges_xml, ".//tei:listPerson/tei:person/tei:persName[@type='label']", ns)), 
    txt=xml_text(xml_find_all(tei_judges_xml, ".//tei:listPerson/tei:person", ns)) 
  ) 

```
